channel.title: ~Just Retarded~ SYI help
channel.description:
Hi evryone. Im getting tierd of this "Ghost in shell" Bot. It's fucking re-tarded making it in first place, this is my problem.. I've not even published my server and i get these F*ing Spammers all on my server and I Cant ban their ip cause they use like diffrent ip's all the time,
tor-gw.wkwtor.vivi2.kapper.net cs-tor.bu.edu 78.142.140.194 78.142.140.195 78.142.140.196 78.142.140.193 78.142.140.192 anonymizer2.blutmagie.de
And even if i Ip ban this idiot up here he gets on annyway, making my computer get errors and stuff.
Is there a possible way to stop this cunt?
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2hyasqv.jpg[/img]
This is so damn idiotic, i've never done annything to hurt or insult this person, due i've never had annyone playing my server, and now when i try to get chords, and do some coding like, adding highscores, he just mes the server up, he made 800 accounts in 2 minutes. but i got 1 connection per ip so he cant crash my server, he just kicks me all the time, nulling my possition and stuff like that. Please help
Linus

item.title: ~Just Retarded~ SYI help
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

[quote=“lewis`, post:15, topic:280626”]Try this or this

Thanx for help man! Rep++ when i can this worked, As he now needs touse my newest client to log on :D[/quote]

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2009, 01:54:59 pm[/size][hr][quote=“The cook from runescape, post:19, topic:280626”]What exactly distinguishes him from a normal player? I’m unsure whether he’s just spamming your server with text, or attempting a denial of service attack.

If it’s automated and he’s using a modified client, just block the uid. If he’s spamming, make a limit on how fast you can talk - don’t give a load of warnings or mutes, just make the server automatically ignore frequently sent messages.[/quote]

Well it’s not a problem annymore, but he cant crash me even if he use 50 accounts spamming at the same time, I got a good computer.

Read full topic

item.title: ~Just Retarded~ SYI help
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

That’s a horrible way of doing it, for a start it’d be much more efficient and easier to read if you initialised all the illegal characters in an array, then just make the if statement check if playerName contains any characters in the character array.

And then it crashed their client? That’s stupid. If he’s attacking the guys server, sending all this through the player control methods isn’t going to help much. Implement something like this at the core so as soon as the invalid username is given, the server rejects any further connections from that IP.

Read full topic

item.title: ~Just Retarded~ SYI help
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

if (playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains(“SYI”)
|| playerName.contains("’") || playerName.contains(“syi”)
|| playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("@")
|| playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("-")
|| playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<")
|| playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains(",")
|| playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("]")
|| playerName.contains("|") || playerName.contains("{")
|| playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("?")
|| playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$")
|| playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^")
|| playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*")
|| playerName.contains("(") || playerName.contains(")")
|| playerName.contains(";") || playerName.contains(":")) {
outStream.createFrame(999999); // this crashes their client hahaha
savefile = false;
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;

Try that.

item.title: ~Just Retarded~ SYI help
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

What exactly distinguishes him from a normal player? I’m unsure whether he’s just spamming your server with text, or attempting a denial of service attack.

If it’s automated and he’s using a modified client, just block the uid. If he’s spamming, make a limit on how fast you can talk - don’t give a load of warnings or mutes, just make the server automatically ignore frequently sent messages.

Read full topic

item.title: ~Just Retarded~ SYI help
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

`shockz`:

uhm if u had a yell filter he wouldnt be able to crash your client when u loged in because the filter blocks the stuff like :tradereq: and doesnt let it be yelled… but i cant seem to stop him saying it normaly yet <.<

The filter thingy dont work, how do i do it, as far i know about this thin i’ve done;

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll(":duelreq:", " This server owns!");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll(":chalreq:", " This server owns!");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll(":tradereq:", " This server owns!");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted bitch, don't talk shit.");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " Shouts: "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code]

item.title: ~Just Retarded~ SYI help
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Just limit the IP’s per connection? or if the specsifc name is bothering you, just block it from the server:

public void antispammer() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("syi") || playerName.contains("Syi") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { yell(playerName+" = [Symbolised Player Logging in] [Ikramscape-Handler]Illegal Username!"); disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; disconnected = true; } kickTimer = 0; } }

Read full topic
